list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Enhance Reflecto.Worker logic, error handling, and UI consistency
- Updated Step2Checks to conditionally include Reflecto.Worker based on configuration values or errors. - Optimized error handling in PlateConfig.ini validation by integrating ConfigLayer awareness. - Adjusted Config.ini and ZymoCubeCtrl.ini checks for better compatibility with PlateConfig.ini. - Improved folder addition logic in CleanPCDialog and adopted with-statement usage for Excel file handling to prevent resource leaks. - Refactored redundant code and removed unused comments for better readability.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Add GUI step modules for installation assistant: Step1Info and Step2Checks.

Add thread-safe communication and summary tab to Step2Checks
- Introduced `Step2Helper` class using `QObject` for thread-safe signals. - Integrated signals for progress updates, results display, and error handling. - Added a new "Summary" tab with a detailed verification results overview.

Refactor Step1Info and core validation logic, migrate dependencies to requirements.txt
- Removed load previous info button in Step1Info to simplify UI. - Updated `validate_acquisition_folder` to include `plate_type` parameter and improved directory validation logic. - Migrated dependencies from pyproject.toml to requirements.txt for compatibility.

Add troubleshooting steps for NumPy installation and update dependencies
- Added instructions for resolving NumPy compilation issues in README. - Introduced `check_numpy_version.py` script to verify NumPy installation. - Updated `requirements.txt` to include missing dependencies. - Adjusted `build_executable.bat` to verify NumPy installation and enforce binary wheels.

Improve configuration handling and cleanup logic in Step4Closure
- Enhanced `_set_client_mode` to use `ConfigParser` for robust `Config.ini` management. - Updated `_clean_pc` to dynamically resolve paths for `Diag/Temp` and acquisitions. - Added error handling for `Config.ini` operations to prevent interruptions during finalization.

Enhance Reflecto.Worker logic, error handling, and UI consistency
- Updated Step2Checks to conditionally include Reflecto.Worker based on configuration values or errors. - Optimized error handling in PlateConfig.ini validation by integrating ConfigLayer awareness. - Adjusted Config.ini and ZymoCubeCtrl.ini checks for better compatibility with PlateConfig.ini. - Improved folder addition logic in CleanPCDialog and adopted with-statement usage for Excel file handling to prevent resource leaks. - Refactored redundant code and removed unused comments for better readability.

MESSAGE.value: Add GUI step modules for installation assistant: Step1Info and Step2Checks.

Add thread-safe communication and summary tab to Step2Checks
- Introduced `Step2Helper` class using `QObject` for thread-safe signals. - Integrated signals for progress updates, results display, and error handling. - Added a new "Summary" tab with a detailed verification results overview.

Add comprehensive tests for Step2Checks reset functionality and UI enhancements
- Added `test_step2_checks.py` to cover all reset states including UI updates. - Enhanced Step2Checks UI with vertical tab navigation and improved folder selection visuals. - Improved user interaction flow by introducing distinct states for initial, analysis, and results views.

Refactor Step1Info and core validation logic, migrate dependencies to requirements.txt
- Removed load previous info button in Step1Info to simplify UI. - Updated `validate_acquisition_folder` to include `plate_type` parameter and improved directory validation logic. - Migrated dependencies from pyproject.toml to requirements.txt for compatibility.

Add troubleshooting section for NumPy installation and improve dependency handling
- Added a guide in `README.md` for resolving common NumPy installation issues. - Introduced `check_numpy_version.py` to verify NumPy installation. - Updated `requirements.txt` to include explicit versioning for dependencies. - Enhanced build script to enforce binary package installation and validate NumPy setup.

Add troubleshooting steps for NumPy installation and update dependencies
- Added instructions for resolving NumPy compilation issues in README. - Introduced `check_numpy_version.py` script to verify NumPy installation. - Updated `requirements.txt` to include missing dependencies. - Adjusted `build_executable.bat` to verify NumPy installation and enforce binary wheels.

Improve configuration handling and cleanup logic in Step4Closure
- Enhanced `_set_client_mode` to use `ConfigParser` for robust `Config.ini` management. - Updated `_clean_pc` to dynamically resolve paths for `Diag/Temp` and acquisitions. - Added error handling for `Config.ini` operations to prevent interruptions during finalization.

Enhance Reflecto.Worker logic, error handling, and UI consistency
- Updated Step2Checks to conditionally include Reflecto.Worker based on configuration values or errors. - Optimized error handling in PlateConfig.ini validation by integrating ConfigLayer awareness. - Adjusted Config.ini and ZymoCubeCtrl.ini checks for better compatibility with PlateConfig.ini. - Improved folder addition logic in CleanPCDialog and adopted with-statement usage for Excel file handling to prevent resource leaks. - Refactored redundant code and removed unused comments for better readability.
